ygData.subject: Lag Question?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, here s the deal . . . I have 320mb ram, which should be more than enough to run EQ. I do have SoL but have been installing and uninstalling it to see if I
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, here's the deal . . . I have 320mb ram, which
should be more than enough to run EQ. I do have SoL but
have been installing and uninstalling it to see if I
can fix my problem which, btw, does not help. I also
have a cable modem so I KNOW I have a fast connection!
But even though I have enough memory and a good
internet connection I am STILL extremely laggy. It takes
me forever to zone and I can hardly move in the
game. SoL apparently has nothing to do with it since it
is the same whether it's installed or uninstalled.
But I DO have a pretty crappy video card. So, I was
wondering if that was the problem,and if I got a better and
new video card if it would help make EQ run faster?
On a diff computer it had a better video card, a
little slower of a connection, and just about the same
memory and it only took me 13 seconds to log into the
game! And it took no time to zone either. So does
anyone think that if I get a little more memory, say
516mb ram, and a better video card, that it will run
faster? Any info would be great! Seeing that I am getting
more frustrated every minute! Nothing seems to work
for me =(
